content.en: Sensor calibration: Researchers have been investigating how to calibrate low-cost sensors for accurate air quality monitoring. They have been using various algorithms, such as linear regression, support vector regression, random forest, and neural networks, to improve the performance of these sensors. By applying machine learning techniques, they aim to enhance the accuracy and reliability of low-cost air quality sensors, which could have significant implications for monitoring and addressing air pollution.
content.da: Sensor kalibrering: Forskere har undersøgt, hvordan man kalibrerer lavpris-sensorer for præcis overvågning af luftkvalitet. De har brugt forskellige algoritmer såsom lineær regression, support vector regression, random forest og neurale netværk for at forbedre disse sensorers ydeevne. Ved at anvende maskinlæringsteknikker sigter de mod at øge nøjagtigheden og pålideligheden af lavpris-sensorer til luftkvalitet, hvilket kan have betydelige konsekvenser for overvågning og håndtering af luftforurening.
